data.title: Austin Industries
data.text:
âWHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â | "I enjoy the people - both our customer's and Austin's. Our customer's facility is a great place to work and many of the Austin employee-owners have worked here for years, so it's like coming home."

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU?Â | "I have always believed in treating my company as if IÂ own it, but with Austin, it's actually true. The better Austin does as a company, the better it can be for me."

HOWÂ DOESÂ OWNERSHIPÂ IMPACTÂ YOURÂ WORK?Â | "Really, ownership hasn't impacted my work. My work ethic is the same no matter where I work: IÂ do my best and it will pay off."

â

Whatâs a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

Static and dynamic content editing

A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

How to customize formatting for each rich text

Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system.

WHATÂ DREWÂ YOUÂ TOÂ AUSTIN? |Â "I started out as an intern, and enjoyed the way I was being pushed to grow and develop. Being in an environment with support and a plan in place to grow is what attracted me to Austin."

WHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â | "I enjoy that I have the freedom to be creative and run with improvement ideas. There are constant day-to-day challenges that keep work interesting."

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU?Â | "Employee-ownership means that I am a part of a group of people that are all working towards a common goal, to execute profitable work and continue to grow our business."

Whatâs a Rich Text element?

âWHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â | "Having great team members and a very close bond gives work a family atmosphere that motivates me to give my best. Our team does a great job of keeping the morale up, we strive to prop up our teammates on their worst days."

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU?Â | "When I worked for a publicly-traded company (whose overseas board focused on finances instead of people), I noticed that competition and turnover increased, and teamwork decreased. Itâs the opposite here at AI. Iâm thankful for high end, challenging projects, excellent collaboration, feeling appreciated, and being part of a dedicated work family."

HOWÂ DOESÂ OWNERSHIPÂ IMPACTÂ YOURÂ WORK?Â | "I work harder to make the best possible decisions for our brand and our people, because I want to see every job perform well for the good of the team. An ownership culture motivates higher performance, because what benefits the company benefits everyone."

â

â

WHATÂ DREWÂ YOUÂ TOÂ AUSTIN? |Â "I followed a former co-worker with whom I had a great relationship. She told me I would be a perfect fit for the Human Resources team here at Austin."

WHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â | "Helping our people makes me smile. I enjoy the satisfaction of assisting/resolving our employee-owners' issues and concerns."

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU?Â | "At Austin, I really do own it! Itâs important to me to contribute to my fellow co-workersâ retirement while helping build for the future."

WHAT ATTRACTED YOU TO AUSTIN INDUSTRIES? | Austin stood out to me as having a strong Texas presence with an attractive culture of employee-ownership with a family or small company feel.

WHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN? | The people I work with and the challenges we overcome.

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU? | It means a commitment to growing and strengthening our company with a vested interest in the longevity of Austin.

â

WHATÂ ATTRACTEDÂ YOUÂ TOÂ AUSTIN? | I take value in understanding the "why," and Austin created an environment that I could grow in. Throughout my career at Austin, employee-owners have taken their time to mentor me, guide me, and encourage me to be the best version of myself.

WHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â |Â I love to build buildings, and I enjoy the process! From the tiniest screw on the project to taking a step back and looking at what our team has built. It still amazes me that everyone works together to build a landmark that we can point at and be proud of.

HOWÂ DOESÂ OWNERSHIPÂ IMPACTÂ WHATÂ YOUÂ DO? |Â To me ownership is working hard, taking pride in your work, and taking time to understand the "why." When I am handed any aspect of the project, big or small, I Â work hard, take pride in my work, and give it my 110%. I OWN IT!

âWHATÂ DOÂ YOUÂ ENJOYÂ ABOUTÂ WORKINGÂ ATÂ AUSTIN?Â | "I love the challenges that I have to work through every day and working with a team that I know will always support me through the tough times."

WHATÂ DOESÂ EMPLOYEE-OWNERSHIPÂ MEANÂ TOÂ YOU?Â | "To me, it means that I have a role in making the company successful and to also teach those around me to keep the Austin traditions going."

HOWÂ DOESÂ OWNERSHIPÂ IMPACTÂ YOURÂ WORK?Â | "It really makes me think about every decision I make because it can have an adverse effect to not only me, but every other employee owner."
